title: Why You Shouldn't Lend A Bad Boy Your Clothes
description: Everything in Jules Hatcher's life is going well: he has a girlfriend, a job and pretty decent grades. That is until he (literally) stumbles into Hunter Adams, the bad boy and player that everyone knows. Soon Hunter has managed to turn Jules' entire world upside down- and make him discover a side of himself, that Jules never knew of.And it all started with that damn hoodie.
author: writing00introvert
